io.janusproject.kernel

Class Kernel

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.janusproject.kernel.Kernel

  • public class Kernel
extends Object
    This class represents the Kernel of the Janus platform.

    The Kernel is a singleton.

    The Kernel is assimilated to an agent that is omniscient and distributed other the network. It is containing all the other agents.

    To create a Kernel, you should use the function create(Module...).

    Version:
    2.0.2.0 2015-04-09 09:04:05
    Author:
    Sebastian Rodriguez, Nicolas Gaud, Stéphane Galland
    Maven Group Id:
    io.janusproject
    Maven Artifact Id:
    io.janusproject.kernel

        Replies if the kernel is running or not.

      • spawn

        public UUID spawn(Class<? extends Agent> agent,
         Object... params)
        Spawn an agent of the given type, and pass the parameters to its initialization function.
        Parameters:
        agent - - the type of the agent to spawn.
        params - - the list of the parameters to pass to the agent initialization function.
        Returns:
        the identifier of the agent, never null.

      • spawn

        public UUID spawn(UUID agentID,
         Class<? extends Agent> agent,
         Object... params)
        Spawn an agent of the given type, and pass the parameters to its initialization function.
        Parameters:
        agentID - - the identifier of the agent to spawn. If null the identifier is randomly selected.
        agent - - the type of the agent to spawn.
        params - - the list of the parameters to pass to the agent initialization function.
        Returns:
        the identifier of the agent, never null.
